pages.text: 20|99|(napiye!) Ivvare umakku munnar cenruponavarkalin carittirattai (melum) nam umakkuk kuruvom. Nam'mitamiruntu nallupatecattai(utaiya ivvetattai) niccayamaka namtan umakku alittom
20|100|evan itai (nampikkai kollamal) purakkanikkirano avan marumai nalil niccayamaka(p periyatoru) pavattaiye cumappan
20|101|atil avan ennalum (ataic cumantu konte) iruppan. Marumai nalil avarkal cumakkum iccumai mikak kettatu
20|102|ekkalam (cur) utappattu kurravalikalai nam onru cerkkum nalil avarkalutaiya kankal (payattinal) nilam puttirukkum
20|103|avarkal tankalukkul metuvaka(p peci) ‘‘ninkal oru pattu (nalkalu)kku atikamaka (ulakattil) tankavillai'' (enru kuruvarkal)
20|104|avarkal enna pecuvarkal enpatai nam nankarivom. Avarkalil mikka nanamullavan (enru karutappatupavan avarkalai nokki) ‘‘oru nale tavira ninkal (atikam) tankavillai'' enru kuruvan
20|105|(napiye!) Um'mitam avarkal malaikalaip parri (atan kati ulaka mutivinpotu ennavakum ena)k ketkirarkal. (Atarku) nir kuruviraka: ‘‘En iraivan avarrait tul tulakki(p parappi) vituvan
20|107|atil oru ciritum metu pallattai nir kanamattir

20|108|annalil (anaivarum ekkalattin mulam) alaippavanin captattaiye pinparric celvarkal. Atil tavaru erpatatu. Rahmanukkup payantu ellac captankalum tanintu vitum. (Metuvana) kalati captattait tavira (veru etaiyum) nir ketkamattir
20|109|Annalil rahman evarukku anumati alittu avarin peccaik ketka avan virumpinano avaraittavira marra evarutaiya ciparicum payanalikkatu
20|110|avarkalukku munnullataiyum pinnullataiyum avan nankarivan. Eninum, avarkal avanai mulumaiyaka arintu kolla mutiyatu
20|111|(annalil) nirantaramanavan, nilaiyanavan (allahvin) mun, anaivarutaiya (talaikalum) mukankalum kunintuvitum. Evan aniyayattaic cumantu kontano avan nastam atainte tiruvan
20|112|evar nampikkai kontavaraka iruntu narceyalkalaic ceykiraro avar, (tan narkuli) alintu vitumenro kuraintu vitumenro payappatamattar

20|113|ivvare inta kur'anai arapi moliyil nam irakki vaittom. Itu avarkalukku nallunarcciyai erpatuttuvatarkakavum avarkal (pavattiliruntu) vilakik kolvatarkakavum itil (nam nam vetanaiyaip parri) eccarikkaikalai vivarittom
